8 class MakeAutomatedPlan(unittest.TestCase):

10  def decide_plan(self, steps, constraints):
11  planner = Planner()
12  planner.initializeTaskGraph(steps)
13  planner.updateTaskGraph(constraints)
14  return planner
15 
16  def assert_plan(self, planner):
17  plan = []
18  done = False
19  while (not done):
20  next_move = planner.decideNextMove()
21  if (not next_move):
22  done = True
23  else:
24  plan.append(next_move)
25  planner.print_list(plan)
26  self.assertTrue(self.plan_is_valid(plan))
27 
28  def plan_is_valid(self, plan):
29  result = True
30  copy = list(plan)
31  for move in plan:
32  if ((move == 'cranfieldStep_006') and ('cranfieldStep_005' in copy)):
33  result = False
34  elif ((move == 'cranfieldStep_007') and ('cranfieldStep_006' in copy)):
35  result = False
36  copy.remove(move)
37  return result

39  def runTest(self):
40  for i in range(10):
41  rdf = RdfManager("http://webprotege.stanford.edu/cogrob.tut/", "/home/anglerau/Franka/catkin_ws/src/cog-rob-tut/franka_tut_reasoning/owl/")
42  rdf.load("root-ontology.owl")
43  """ Retrieve useful information about the task """
